ctx: intros T U F FF a.
exceptions.tactic: destruct (fct_ball_center T U a) as [eps eps_prop].
exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type U : UniformSpace F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F a : U P : U -> Prop HP : exists eps : posreal, forall y : U, ball a eps y -> P y The term "a" has type "UniformSpace.sort U" while it is expected to have type "T -> U".

original: intros T U F FF a. unfold filterlim. intros P HP. unfold locally in HP. destruct (fct_ball_center T U a) as [eps eps_prop]. exists eps. intros x ball_ax_a. apply HP. exists eps. intros y ball_x_eps_y. apply eps_prop. apply fct_ball_sym. apply ball_ax_a. apply ball_x_eps_y.
